channel.title: If you have defenders read this post
channel.description: ok im getting my defenders and im kinda stuck. now the people with defenders dont want how they got them to get out to the public so help me on aim or pm

duh defender “defe”=defence…it does go into the defence slot but doesnt show up in that hand.
